title: Pattern Meta Schema
description: Meta data that describes a pattern (component, layout, etc) that comes from the Basalt Crux Design System.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title or Name of the pattern.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifying machine friendly name of pattern.

template.title: Template
template.description: Path (prefixed with namespace) of pattern template. Example '@components/_media-block.twig'.
